name: Metal Burst: Primordial Forces
description:
Long ago on the primordial earth, powerful forces of nature ravage across the land. When the earth rumbles, a volcanic force emerges to threaten the land. In the forest, lies a guardian who will face this foe head on.

This is a bullet-hell style SHMUP with light metal elements. Draws heavily from the "Touhou" series and "Metal-style" music.

Feel free to give feedback via our Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/KbQE9GPEtAGuob6X7

This game project was made for the "Progressive Game Jam #6" hosted by the SDC (Sacramento Developers Collective). This demo was made over the course of 8 Months, starting in Mid-January 2020, ending in Mid-September 2020.

Credits:
Kevin Feng ("ReimJ") - Project Lead, Design, & Art
Jonathan Camarena ("Kyperbelt") - Programming
Josh Zamora ("Jzamo") - Music & Audio
Kyle Wynn (link) - Additional Music
